long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ordinals wallet supporting Bitcoin protocol


1. Ordinals Wallet
- Non-custodial extension wallet
-Storing, sending and receiving Bitcoin and tokens/ordinal numbers
- BRC-20 support

2. Decentralized personal wallet
- Securely manage your wallet with 12/24 keywords or private keys.
- You can use your wallet in another wallet using your private key.
- You own your private keys.

3. Ordinal support
- Easily display and navigate all Ordinals collections.
- You can send and receive for Bitcoin and ordinal numbers.


BTNS Wallet is a non-custodial wallet. We do not have access to your funds. BTNS Wallet never stores your seed phrase, password or personal information. Your account is derived from your secret recovery phrase.

- Your account is derived from your secret recovery phrase.
- Your private key is encrypted on your device with your password and should never be shared with anyone.
- BTNS Wallet does not track personally identifiable information, account addresses, or asset balances.
- Users can import accounts from a single private key. These accounts are not derived from the secret recovery phrase and are marked as "Import".
